import React,{useContext} from 'react'; import './Checkout.css'; import {CartContext} from '../../Context/Cart'; export default function CheckoutBody(){ const{cartItems, totalItems}=useContext(CartContext); return(
Billing details
Name
Phone Number
Email
Province
District
Address
Your order
{ cartItems.map((item,index)=>{ return(
{item.productName}
) }) }
SUBTOTAL
{totalItems.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ".") }đ
SUBTOTAL
) }
